lyric:
[00:01.420]让绝对无敌的传说
[00:03.890]能永远不会被打破
[00:07.050]必须要战斗 my way
[00:08.720]if I'm ever gonna get back
[00:11.110]get back, get back
[00:11.980]
[00:12.680]让绝对无敌的传说
[00:15.350]能永远记住在心中
[00:18.490]必须要战斗 my way
[00:20.130]if I'm ever gonna get back hey~~
[00:23.190]
[00:23.890]Yo picture this
[00:25.230]U got a kid in a room
[00:26.710]his hands sweatin and shakin while he's lacin his shoes
[00:29.450]the excitement's buildin up for what's comin up soon
[00:32.790]To get there and do what he was born to do
[00:34.510]
[00:34.910]他拥有篮球梦
[00:36.190]他成为地狱修罗
[00:37.820]他知道全盘战局只能够靠自己掌控
[00:40.630]虽感到一点疲倦
[00:41.980]虽感到一些危险
[00:43.440]但是在胜负分明之前绝对不会退却
[00:46.120]
[00:46.220]Cuz now he's out on the floor
[00:47.770]And he's catchin the pass
[00:49.340]slashin to the glass, movin so fast, right to the hole,
[00:52.210]they don't know how to stop him
[00:53.980]and he keeps on droppin
[00:55.650]2's and 3's by the second
[00:57.130]and the crowd is rockin
[00:58.500]so they knock him
[00:59.970]躺在冰冷地上
[01:01.320]只要一个深呼吸就能再冲刺全场
[01:04.060]慢动作的世界
[01:05.400]欢呼声蜂拥如浪
[01:06.900]就在一分钟
[01:08.140]过后强者加冕称王
[01:10.120]
[01:10.220]让绝对无敌的传说
[01:12.710]能永远不会被打破
[01:15.910]必须要战斗 my way
[01:17.540]if I'm ever gonna get back
[01:19.800]get back, get back
[01:20.950]
[01:21.350]让绝对无敌的传说
[01:23.850]能永远记住在心中
[01:26.920]必须要战斗 my way
[01:28.650]if I'm ever gonna get back hey~~
[01:32.890]Yo imagine
[01:33.820]有个女孩出现
[01:35.180]她在人群之中永远都是第一耀眼
[01:38.020]她总是在身边
[01:39.440]不知心里想谁
[01:40.910]所有男孩梦想有天能给她全世界
[01:43.510]
[01:43.310]But the truth
[01:45.090]is that there's someone on the other team
[01:47.530]Someone who stole her heart
[01:48.670]Someone who holds her dreams
[01:50.120]They kiss for the 1st time just the other evening
[01:52.880]Her brother's 23 but her lover's number 16
[01:55.270]
[01:55.670]战况激烈 好戏正要上演
[01:57.840]女孩不知道自己应该站哪一边
[02:00.900]眼神交汇 局势瞬息万变
[02:03.800]大家都屏住呼吸忍住不眨眼
[02:06.600]
[02:06.700]16 on the break
[02:08.260]23 on the chase
[02:09.560]Brother goes in the air with brother up in his face
[02:12.440]They come crashing to the dirt
[02:14.100]Tears about to burst
[02:15.310]When the game is over who she gonna run to first, yo
[02:18.410]
[02:18.210]让绝对无敌的传说
[02:20.630]能永远不会被打破
[02:24.080]必须要战斗 my way
[02:25.720]if I'm ever gonna get back
[02:28.040]get back, get back
[02:29.090]
[02:29.790]让绝对无敌的传说
[02:32.430]能永远记住在心中
[02:35.520]必须要战斗 my way
[02:37.260]if I'm ever gonna get back hey~~
[02:41.290]
[02:42.290]有时感觉阻碍太多
[02:45.180]但我还是为了我的
[02:48.020]梦想而战斗
[02:50.130]Nothin's gonna stop me
[02:52.290]
[02:52.390]Ey yo this game of life is one big struggle
[02:54.530]We gotta hustle just to make it everyday
[02:56.650]and to find ourselves a way
[02:58.440]to fight the fears we facin
[02:59.820]and grab those dreams we chasin
[03:01.620]cuz there ain't no competition
[03:02.570]when we rise to the occasion, c'mon
[03:03.570]
[03:04.570]让绝对无敌的传说
[03:07.000]能永远不会被打破
[03:10.160]必须要战斗 my way
[03:11.830]if I'm ever gonna get back
[03:14.140]get back, get back
[03:15.810]让绝对无敌的传说
[03:18.440]能永远记住在心中
[03:21.490]必须要战斗 my way
[03:23.330]if I'm ever gonna get back hey~~
[03:29.260]
